website_summaries.verdict: Babies with sensitive stomachs do well on this well-balanced formula.
pros: Works well for babies who reject or have reactions to other formulas
Contains add-ins that make it close in nutrient value to breast milk
cons: May cause constipation in some babies

customer_reviews.title: Baby miracle powder
customer_reviews.text: Moms, let go of the guilt and buy this miracle powder that will nourish your baby and help him/her thrive. Don't listen to those other moms that try to passive aggressively shame you. When you're in that restaurant and hunger strikes your baby, take out your go-to miracle powder transporter, poor it into that water filled bottle, look that judgy witch straight in the eye and shake that bottle like you mean it! Sometimes, breastfeeding doesn't work out, so do the next best thing and get this stuff. My baby is on a mixture of this and breast milk since I can't seem to pump enough for him. He has no gas issues and is never fussy. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: The seal was broken
customer_reviews.text: The seal was broken. The inner seal wasn't, so we still used it, but both of them should be intact.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: No more gas
customer_reviews.text: Since my son started on this brand (switched from Neosure) he has been so much less gassy. He used to have a hard time passing (grunting, straining) but I haven’t noticed any of that since using this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Foster

customer_reviews.title: Less Gas = Happy Baby
customer_reviews.text: We've tried many types of similac and all others seemed to make our little one gassy. This formula does not make baby gassy and she is content after eating. She also seems to like the formula of this one better then any of the others we have tried which includes the sensitive formula.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered twice and both broken seals
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product however I am very disappointed that I cannot order through Amazon. This is the second one I’ve ordered and returned because the seal has been broken on both of them when I open the box. Should not feed any formula with any broken seals to an infant. So therefore ordering through Amazon seems to be much more of a hassle. Disappointed because it’s so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Solum

customer_reviews.title: Nutrition and taste
customer_reviews.text: We are giving this to our daughter since she was born and she is healthier beyond expectations. Also she loves the taste of pro advance. Excellent product and price. One pack last around 10 days so thats $3/day.
customer_reviews.author: JkhanC1

customer_reviews.title: Best formula out there. Period.
customer_reviews.text: Our little one hasn't spit up once with this formula, no issues feeding. Can't complain, and it's definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tragic_comic

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4 and 2 came unsealed. I was refunded for those but once I opened one it smelled horrible. Opened the other and it smelled fine. Made a bottle and my baby was spitting up like crazy, something she never does. I won’t order from amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Easy switch from breast milk to formula!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous when I had to switch my baby from breast milk to formula. She wouldn’t take Enfamil at all, but she took this with no hesitation! No bad reactions or anything! Thank you Similac for making the switch easy, and including the immune support similar to breast milk!
customer_reviews.author: T.M.

customer_reviews.title: Beware- broken outer seal - always check
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best formulas out there HOWEVER there is a problem with broken seal. Every time we receive our monthly batch of this formula the outer seal is broken at least on one of them. Per manufacturer's note - you MUST NOT use it if any of the seals are broken (outside or inside). So, please be aware of that. As for the product itself - 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: We have been using the similac advance formula since the hospital stay. Recently I think you changed containers from aluminum to plastic. We did fine on the aluminum containers. We purchased a plastic container and after two weeks we noticed the smell was quite different from the aluminum containers. Very funky and fishy, I am guessing from the omegas. But we never had a problem with the aluminum. The expire date is 2020. Our son refuses to eat it and we have had to stop giving this one to him. That is a waste for a $30 container. It is hard to find the aluminum ones and not sure what else to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Similac best for formula snobs like my baby
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a formula snob. We use it if we're on the road in a bind. Similac is the only brand she'll drink without it being mixed with breast milk. Straight Enfamil she makes a terrible face and spits it out. From what I've read, Similac is sweeter and has a closer flavor to breast milk.
customer_reviews.author: AmazinAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Hi I received this product for my baby a week ago I’ve been using it. But I’ve now noticed there were little tiny bugs in the formula And I’m hoping my baby doesn’t get sick due to this I’m very upset I can’t refund it cus it’s been used. But can someone get back to me. I don’t want another formula cus I’m not gona be using this brand anymore. If a refund is acceptable that will be great. But other then that I’m very disappointed about this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Like Other Similac
customer_reviews.text: This Similac had a different color (lighter) than the previous Similac I bought, and it didn't completely dissolve in hot water. I think there was something wrong with it even though all three that I bought were sealed. I won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work well for newborn
customer_reviews.text: Gave my daughter terrible gas and discomfort. I switched to pro- comfort. She only gets small amounts of she is still hungry after being breastfed but similacs pro comfort seems to be a better fit for her. All of the products taste chalky to me and nothing like breast milk. Sometimes she still seems hungry but spits it out.
customer_reviews.author: J&Sull

customer_reviews.title: Lots Of Gas
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product because it was the first formula my son received at the hospital but after using it at home we quickly discovered that it was not the one for him. He experienced an excessible amount of gas and was miserable throughout. Constantly crying resulted as well which resulted in many sleepless nights. After switching to a more gentle formula he is happy baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McMillian

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend and he said they loved it until they decided to switch to goat milk for more nutrients??? This was cheapest we found it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelis

customer_reviews.title: Great formuLa
customer_reviews.text: My LO loves this formula but wherever this shipped from, it arrived filthy and beat up. I will not be buying from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica I

customer_reviews.title: Broken tamper seal
customer_reviews.text: The outside tamper seal was broken. There's 6 or 7 other reviews that say the same thing so this isn't a one-off occurrence. I'm heading to the grocery store now because I didn't notice until I needed it and I just won't take any risk that it may have been tampered with. Why would so many people have the broken seals if the distributor wasn't doing something?
customer_reviews.author: Ben & Emily Nonnemacher

customer_reviews.title: Not for my baby
customer_reviews.text: My first child used Similac exclusively, but my second will not. She gags at the smell and taste. When I did get her to drink it she spit up and had terrible gas. Switched brands and everything is better now. That being said, every baby is different. Like I said, my first baby drank it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Great for our baby!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby had a very delicate stomach and experienced a lot of spit up. This was the only formula that saved us from going to other special formulas that are usually given to babies in these situations.
customer_reviews.author: ortizlop

customer_reviews.title: ... been on this formula since birth and has responded great to it
customer_reviews.text: My son has been on this formula since birth and has responded great to it. He is in the 90 percentile both height and weight. Very few instances of tummy upset or colic but I use slow flow nipples and anti colic bottles so they probably help too. All in all pretty happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: NewMom

customer_reviews.title: Best substitute for Mother’s milk
customer_reviews.text: Similac Pro-Advance is the best substitute for mother’s milk. I bought this for my cousin’s son and he didn’t have any tummy issues with it. He totally liked it and it was his main supplement. Reasonable price and 1 box lasts almost for 10 days.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Good brand
customer_reviews.text: Great product, arrived in perfect condition but was 2 days late which was a huge inconvenience when you have a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: This is the One
customer_reviews.text: This is for SURE the best formula to transition from breastfeeding. I spent a fortune on several formulas that claimed to be like breast milk, but this is the only one my baby would accept.
customer_reviews.author: Thargrove

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Same Similac Pro-Advance found in stores with a slightly cheaper price. Due to the pandemic, it took much longer than anticipated to arrive. Expiration date for 2021 so plenty of shelf life left.
customer_reviews.author: Gessy

customer_reviews.title: Box seal is Broken! Can’t trust the product.
customer_reviews.text: The product was leaking from the top as shown in the pictures. Also the gold sticker seal was open. The inside of the box was sealed but formula is still leaking from the sides of the top. I ordered it in a hurry in the last minute and really needed it but didn’t expect this experience from Amazon. Now that I read more, There are so many negative reviews on this product and Amazon didn’t take it seriously. I regret my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lighting

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy online,
customer_reviews.text: When we received our tub the seal was broken and tampered with
customer_reviews.author: mshen

customer_reviews.title: Know what formula your baby takes
customer_reviews.text: This is the formula My baby first took in the hospital so she had no problem liking this but 2 weeks later she was very fussy due to this because she has a lactose sensitivity. But i love similac brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Brennan

customer_reviews.title: something was off
customer_reviews.text: We buy this in the store all the time. I thought we could save some time and money by using subscription. Unfortunately the formula never fully dissolved no matter what we tried. It was very strange.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Powell

customer_reviews.title: good product, not so good arrival
customer_reviews.text: product is fine. unfortunately when shipped or packed the product was tossed around. it arrived with 2 of the 3 having the top lid completely busted off. and there was a large piece of grass somehow in the box..
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Trusted brand with great ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Had no problems transitioning from breastfeeding to this formula. My daughter has had no digestion issues and seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Formula
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this on Amazon after reading reviews of people claiming that it's not the same thing purchased in stores. We have had no problems with this and it appears to be the exact same product and the quality appears the same.
customer_reviews.author: Paige A

customer_reviews.title: Works in a Pinch
customer_reviews.text: I needed formula and had a coupon through Similac. Ordered and received it next day. It's a little on the expensive side if you don't have a coupon but it's the formula that my kids are on, pretty standard.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Our baby does great with this formula
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to feed formula but we ended up needing to supplement. Our baby does great with this formula. He doesn't get gassy or spit up. We tried gerber gentle and it was absolutely terrible for him. He got terrible gas. So glad this formula is something that works well for him
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Baby girl chows down on it
customer_reviews.text: Our little girl lives this stuff and chows down on it. She is growing steady. I personally think it tastes terrible (i taste everything we give her) but she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: i give 5 star but why much more expensive than other countries
customer_reviews.text: same is 1/3 price in another country i dodnt want to mention it is same brand and same company really hard to understand for product yep 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Can&Mom

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave in heat
customer_reviews.text: We have a locker drop off system at my apt complex. It was in the locker for almost 3 hours. I guess the milk spoiled and gave my baby the runs. I ended up throwing it away. This was the 2nd time I ordered. The first time I was able to get it right away and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Essence Dent-Bey

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Alright I guess. Its formula so not like i tried it. Kids didnt seem to mind but it's the same formula they've been on.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, great formula
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to keep costs down and provide great nutrition for a baby then this formula is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Nuge

customer_reviews.title: Good price, quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Thanks Amazon for the same day delivery. Favorite formula delivered without leaving my house.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Baby's favorite
customer_reviews.text: Our kid has been drinking this from 10-14 months. She loves it. It was an easy transition to whole milk. She tried other brands, enfamil and highly disliked it. She will only drink Similac. She hasn't had any issues with it, gas, pooping, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Rawal

customer_reviews.title: Great formula
customer_reviews.text: Great for regular use and supplementing. It would be nice if it was a little cheaper, but it is a great formula. Never had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pros - I have not tried other products in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros - I have not tried other products in the market but i know that my kid loves this. Also no issues found and i have using this from several months
customer_reviews.author: GauravJ

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The seal is damaged and on the top of the box there is warning not to use if the quality seal is damaged
customer_reviews.author: Naresh Kumar Ediga

customer_reviews.title: Breast that I've found so far...
customer_reviews.text: This is, so far that I've found, the only formula that seems to generate a stool similar to that of a breast fed baby (visually speaking). It is also important to note that this formula didn't produce any colic reactions. So this is about the extent of what I can say for sure about my experience since I can't run labs or exchange notes with my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Howard

customer_reviews.title: Formula for baby
customer_reviews.text: Son likes this formula had to switch to the total comfort because of his stomach issues. Overall smells good
customer_reviews.author: David Abramowitz

customer_reviews.title: Gassy and constipated
customer_reviews.text: Makes baby gassy and constipated. Can use as a backup product for breastfeeding babies.
customer_reviews.author: Chuchu

customer_reviews.title: 6mo old LOVES
customer_reviews.text: We had to try many different formulas & brands before finally landing on this one for my son. He wouldn’t spit up and it would help keep him full longer. It shook up really well with no formula clumps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Very upset. Two of the formula cans I bought arrived with broken seals.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out for my baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on on the thousands of good reviews. Maybe this might work for older babies but it HIGHLY constipated my 2 week old. Stool was thick as clay. I had to switch back to Similac Pro-Sensitive
customer_reviews.author: sida Kinnavongsa

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My son responds well to this formula. Only one we have found that works
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Gas induced
customer_reviews.text: Made my baby gassy. Switched to similac comfort with the purple top
customer_reviews.author: Darlene N

customer_reviews.title: Good for weight gain when supplementing breastfed babies
customer_reviews.text: I started giving this to my breastfed baby for supplementation at around 6 months old. He was still having trouble gaining weight so I switched him over to this formula completely and he has done really well on it. He gained weight quickly and didn’t spit up a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t feel comfortable using
customer_reviews.text: The powdered formula arrived with the safety seal broken as if it had been open
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Works for Colic Babies
customer_reviews.text: We tried Aptamil and Enfamil for our new born baby but they were huge disappointment. After using this particular Similac, we saw clear difference in child's colic. He is more active during day time, sleeps peacefully and loves his formula milk.
customer_reviews.author: Usman Shahid

customer_reviews.title: Good formula
customer_reviews.text: I like to buy Similac for my nine month old. It is a good brand and my baby doesn’t seem to have any stomach problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It's nice that it was delivered to my door, but you can get the same size for the same price at any grocery store or Wal-Mart. The best value for formula has to be with the Parent's Choice brand. You get more for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: all formula is expensive
customer_reviews.text: My baby likes this the best. Ive tried several and always come back to this.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Containers damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three, and two of them were delivered with the yellow-seals torn. Even the container lid was broken. Only one container arrived safe.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong type of formula actually delivered
customer_reviews.text: The product described is not what was delivered, and the powder smelled very foul. In fact my daughter refuses to drink it (checked the expiration date and it’s ok, and the seal was intact). Throwing away, what a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amy O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about my daughter having colic, but it actually didn't cause any.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great Formula
customer_reviews.text: My son started using this at a young age and has never had an issue with it. The price on the big containers is better though.
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't foam and mixes well!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! Our little one loves that it doesn't foam up and it mixes really well.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by a friend
customer_reviews.text: It was gentle on my baby’s stomach. I was nursing full time but my production went down when I returned to work this was an easy transition for my little one. No upset tummy’s over here.
customer_reviews.author: Dcoulter19

customer_reviews.title: Brand tells all~!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think that i have to say anything about similac products the brand tells all about it~!!Only infant formula for my baby~!!!
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS REN

customer_reviews.title: Not the right formula for me...
customer_reviews.text: Not the right formula for my baby, she was very gassy and gave her a lot of poopy diapers. had to switch to the sensitive Similac formula and it's definitely better for her digestion
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This stuff constipated my baby. Threw it out before finishing it . Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Sade

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this
customer_reviews.text: I love similac formula for my baby, it’s soft on his tummy and doesn’t make him sick. I just wish it was more affordable because it really is the best formula you can get!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Marie Atwater

customer_reviews.title: Baby seems to love it
customer_reviews.text: we were not producing enough Brest milk at first and utilized this to supplement. baby loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: No issues
customer_reviews.text: Baby transitioned easily from breastfeeding and it tastes better than enfamil
customer_reviews.author: Z.A.

customer_reviews.title: Seal  broken
customer_reviews.text: The seal was broken! Have to return as this isn't safe to feed my infant
customer_reviews.author: Olivia J.

customer_reviews.title: Both seals are closed
customer_reviews.text: My breast milk has decreased so we’ve been using this, this is so hard to get around my area sometimes or they run out. Love this formula so much for my baby
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Both are good
customer_reviews.text: Baby like both similac and enfamil. I cannoy tell the difference
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: i m happy this products. My baby like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Shahidulislam

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for small babies!
customer_reviews.text: We started our preemie twins on this after breastfeeding failed and it was a wonderful substitution. It seemed to be the closest we could get nutritionally to actual breastmilk.
customer_reviews.author: Hale

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's all expensive so I guess ok. It's what my grandson uses.
customer_reviews.author: Elena E Grose

customer_reviews.title: Fair pricing
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very fair pricing for the amount of milk you get.
customer_reviews.author: HSK

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My first son drank Enfamil and did great on it! So nothing against Enfamil! However, my second son kept throwing it up, in a BIG way. I decided to try this Similac Pro-Advance and it has worked out GREAT! He never spits up and he seems to really like it! Also, his stools actually resemble that of when he was breastfed. Happy baby = happy mommy!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery on emergency buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I would typically buy this at Target but i couldn't leave the house and I ran out. It was a emergency buy. We only use Similac. We tried the generic and it made my baby extra gassy, weird cause it's the same ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: CudaZ

customer_reviews.title: Need this as soon as i got out the hospital ...
customer_reviews.text: Need this as soon as i got out the hospital and since i was by myself with a baby it was easier to get 2 day shipping to the house
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the product over all . The shipping was not to great . The item arrived dented .
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Lamb

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT, feed your baby
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars cause i mean at this age when they are drinking formula what else is there to give them right...
customer_reviews.author: chaddy

customer_reviews.title: Same product from in the store
customer_reviews.text: Everything seemed the same as store bought. Thank you for a fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Johnson

customer_reviews.title: ... had no issues with this and it mixes very easily. This brand was given at hospital in NJ
customer_reviews.text: Baby had no issues with this and it mixes very easily. This brand was given at hospital in NJ.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: Of the different formula's we tried for our baby, this was the best to keep her full and happy and really kept gas to a minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Consensus Carla

customer_reviews.title: Easy to digest
customer_reviews.text: No spit up. Easy to digest. Our 5m old loves it. Container is practical with room to store the scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Guy S.

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: the same price as the store, so i guess thats nice. Was completely sealed when arrived
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: this is second time the items were opened when i received it. so that i gave three stars
customer_reviews.text: this is second time the items were opened when i received it. so that i gave three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems bigger than it is, I'll stick with buying this at walmart
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Glad this works!
customer_reviews.text: My baby like it. I transfor from ready to feed similac pro advance non gmo to this one. I am afraid powder might not work as well as ready to feed. But I was wrong. This is work much better than ready to feed. Less spit up. I will keep update if anything change. My baby just finished his 5th bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Little Cindy Riding HoodTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This looks like the standard 32oz you get in stores but it’s only 23 for almost the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: My daughter didnt like it much we had to switch to pro sensitive
customer_reviews.author: che-an de leon

customer_reviews.title: We Love Similac
customer_reviews.text: We love Similac. Our baby never had issues taking it and is a very healthy child now.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes the formula.
customer_reviews.text: Love this formula. Baby is happy we are happy. Product came intact.
customer_reviews.author: FT

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Horrible value - so many other brands make the same exact product for much cheaper. Don’t waste your money and shop around!
customer_reviews.author: SARAH

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but one of the packages arrived damaged!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandragzzfdz

customer_reviews.title: Similac
customer_reviews.text: It’s Similac lasted a few weeks for my daughter when I stopped breastfeeding
customer_reviews.author: Emily shumaker

customer_reviews.title: Hospital recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product since the day she was born in the hospital!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells bad but she drank it and the ingredients are great!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

product_meta.title: Similac Pro-Advance Non-GMO Infant Formula with Iron, with 2'-FL HMO, for Immune Support, Baby Formula, Powder, 23.2 Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:23.2 Ounce (Pack of 1)Similac Pro-Advance with 2’-FL human milk oligosaccharide provides immune support by encouraging immune cells to release protective proteins in amounts more like the breastfed baby. It’s also the first leading infant formula with no artificial growth hormones. Parents reported a reduction in fussiness, gassiness, crying, and spit-up after just 1 day of feeding, and the improvement was maintained while feeding the formula. Our exclusive blend of DHA, Lutein, and Vitamin E is important for helping support baby’s brain and eye development. You can trust Similac, the #1 infant formula brand chosen by moms and the #1 brand fed in hospitals. Not from human milk. No significant difference has been shown between milk derived from rbST-treated and non-rbST-treated cows. After switching to Similac Pro-Advance. Total US infant formula, all outlets as of 3/31/2018, Nielsen data.
feature_bullets: #1 BRAND FOR IMMUNE SUPPORT*: Similac Pro-Advance is the first infant formula with 2’- FL HMO** designed to be closer than over to breast milk. (*IQVIA ProVoice Survey 12 months ending February 2020; **not from human milk)

NO ARTIFICIAL GROWTH HORMONES: Similac is the first leading infant formula brand with no artificial growth hormones (No significant difference has been shown between milk derived from rbST-treated and non-rbST-treated cows)
REDUCED FUSSINESS: Parents reported reduced fussiness, gassiness, and spit-up after 1 day (After switching to Similac Pro-Advance)
TRUSTED: Similac is the #1 infant formula brand chosen by moms* and the #1 brand fed in hospitals (*total US infant formula all outlets as of 3/31/18, Nielsen data)
BRAIN & EYE DEVELOPMENT: Our exclusive blend of DHA, Lutein, and Vitamin E – nutrients also found in breast milk – helps support baby’s overall growth and brain and eye development
